text: Ezɨ kɨ ofa gamir gumazim Selemia ko, Godɨn Akɨnafarim gɨfozir gumazim Sadok, ko Livain gumazim Pedaia, me amɨsevegha ghaze, me Dɨpenir kamɨn aven itir danganir kabar kɨrigh an biziba mengam. Egha kɨ gumazir mam men akurvaghasa anemɨsefe. An ziam Hanan, a Sakurɨn otarim, egha Matanian igavotarim. Gumazamiziba ghaze, gumazir kaba arazir aghuibaram ami, ezɨ kɨ me amɨsefe. Ezɨ me uan namakaba bagh dagheba tuiragh da mengegh da isɨ me danɨngam.
